title: App freezes if tap on sticker with non-existing contract
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug
*Summary*: if tap on sicker, sent by someone in chats that is not available anymore - app freezes and to continue work you need to releaunch it.

#### Expected behavior
no freeze

#### Actual behavior
app is freezing

### Reproduction

- Open Status
- Tap on sticker sent earlier (contract for stickerpack doesn't exist anymore)
I found this sticker 22.07 (between 04:38 and 12:37 on Madrid time) in `#status` channel
![photo_2019-07-31 13 08 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/62207401-4a06c480-b394-11e9-8169-901294be3c65.jpeg)
- Try to set focus in text input field



### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly 31/07/2019, release 0.14 build `#16`
- Operating System: Android, iOS

#### Logs


```
--------- beginning of main
07-31 13:14:41.594  1467  2207 D InputDispatcher: notifyMotion - action=ACTION_DOWN(0), id=0, pressure=0.373, tooltype=1, deviceId=4, source=0x1002, policyFlags=0x0, flags=0x0, metaState=0x0, buttonState=0x0, edgeFlags=0x0, eventTime=80491594105000, downTime=80491594105000,
```
